title: Winning contest for the M21
content: The Ministry of Education run a contest of the Learning Space Design by code name M21. Keshet school in Kochav Yair took the challenge. I volunteered and had a pleasure to lead the project. Fortunately our proposal was listed among winners and the school received a budget for its implementation.
